title: MASH the Movie (1970) Donald Sutherland (DVDrip)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0066026/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0066026/</a>

Donald Sutherland made all the difference in this first and original Oscar-winning version of M*A*S*H. You who have only watched the endless TV series will notice what you have missed.

This is not my rip, I found it on the net using PirateBay's tracker, so I thought it should be represented here. Picture quality is not great and I was tempted to make a better rip, but the torrent is already well-established with lots of seeders. A full DVD is available here at PirateBay if you want better quality.

Widescreen 480x272, stereo.

Burn tested, runs well in my standalone DivX player.
